title: webrtc learning
body:
by **rsandhya3dec**: 
Hi im a new learner to webrtc..
I will greatful if someone help me in clarifying my doubt..

how does ice agent send stun request using ice-ufrag?

I got this doubt mainly because peerconnection is created in the beginning itself and
the sessiondescription is known only after icecandidate pair is known..

so how does ice agent get to know the ice-ufrag and obtain the server-reflexive address??
